Home.title: Learn French at Your Own Pace with Expert-led Video Lessons
Home.description: Improve your French language skills with our comprehensive video lessons. We propose a convenient, serious and fun way to learn French as a foreign language and achieve fluency. Start French Now!

StoriesApp.title: Learn French with Start French Now: Interactive Stories & Online Courses
StoriesApp.description: Discover a unique way to master the French language with Start French Now. Dive into interactive stories, structured courses on Udemy, and a plethora of educational content tailored for global learners.

Stories.title: Learn French the Fun Way with Interactive Stories | StartFrenchNow
Stories.description: Dive into immersive French stories and boost your language skills effortlessly. Explore Paris and learn French at your own pace. Start French Now!

Blog.title: Start French Now Blog: Your Ultimate Guide to Learning French
Blog.description: Unlock the secrets of learning French with Start French Now Blog. From grammar to vocabulary, our articles offer an extensive, understandable guide to mastering the language.

Videos.title: Our Educational Videos ‚Äì Learn Easily and Effectively | Start French Now
Videos.description: Explore our collection of educational videos to learn French. Whether you're a beginner or intermediate, our fun and informative videos will guide you through every step of your learning journey.

About.title: Meet Yohann: Your Expert Guide to Learning French from Scratch
About.description: Discover Yohann's journey from a primary school teacher to a global expert in teaching French to beginners. Start your own French learning journey with us!

Beginners.title: The Complete French Course : Learn French - Beginners | StartFrenchNow
Beginners.description: French Language for Beginners (A0 > A2). French speaking, listening, grammar, reading, vocabulary with a native teacher.

Intermediates.title: The Complete French Course : Learn French - Low Intermediate | StartFrenchNow
Intermediates.description: French Language Course for Low Intermediate level A2 to B1. Advance your knowledge with a native teacher.

Dialogues.title: The Complete French Course - Daily Life Conversations | StartFrenchNow
Dialogues.description: French Language Course - Intermediate level A2 to B1. Master Everyday French Communication with 100 Real-Life Dialogues.

PastTenses.title: Master the Past Tenses in French | StartFrenchNow
PastTenses.description: Speak in the past in French. Learn the 3 main past tenses : pass√© compos√©, imparfait, plus-que-parfait. Understand the differences between the past tenses and use them together.

HeroSfn.title: <hs4>Learn French</hs4> at Your Own Pace with <hs2>High Quality</hs2> French Lessons
HeroSfn.description: You want to be serious about learning French? Don't worry, it doesn't have to be boring.

LessonCards.title: Find a course that suits you and <hs4>get started</hs4>!
LessonCards.description: No "Blabla"! The objective is to really learn and understand the French language in order to speak it. A method for beginners and intermediates with the intention of guiding you to a level of confidence where you can "fly on your own".
LessonCards.notSureDescription: Click here and send me a message!

beginnerLevel1.title: Beginner - Level 1 (A0 to A2)
beginnerLevel1.description: For complete beginners who want to master the basics of French. Build and develop practical communication skills in French: speaking, listening, reading and writing.

lowIntermediateLevel2.title: Low intermediate - Level 2 (A2.1)
lowIntermediateLevel2.description: Deepen your knowledge of French and advance from A2 to B1. Learn all the tools you need for building longer and more complex sentences. Speak real French confidently on familiar topics.

lowIntermediateLevel3.title: Dailylife Dialogues - Level 3 (A2-B1)
lowIntermediateLevel3.description: Advance your French speaking abilities with a course that brings daily French life to your lessons through engaging dialogues, targeted grammar practice and vocabulary. You'll be equipped to live and communicate in France with ease !

masterPastTenses.title: Master the past tenses
masterPastTenses.description: Speak in the past in French. Learn the 3 main past tenses : pass√© compos√©, imparfait, plus-que-parfait. Understand the differences between the past tenses and use them together.

UdemyBusiness.title: Join <hs2>students worldwide</hs2> in our quality French content and courses.
UdemyBusiness.paragraph1: One of our greatest pleasures is to see that our students come from over 140 different countries ! They all have their own objective towards the French language and our mission is to help them in <noWrap>reaching it.</noWrap>
UdemyBusiness.paragraph2: Our courses have also been recommended to big companies and their employees via the Udemy for Business programm that rewards the best courses based on the student feedback, their relevance and <noWrap>general quality.</noWrap>

CoreValuesMethod.title: The core values of <hs4>our method</hs4>
CoreValuesMethod.description: A <under>well structured</under> method with <under>bite-sized lessons</under> that enables you to acquire the <under>fundamental</under> French language skills.

serious.title: Serious
serious.content: A structured and serious method where the student feel guided and supported all along.

smartLearning.title: Smart learning
smartLearning.content: New concepts are well identified, difficulties are isolated, explained, worked on and gradually integrated with your current knowledge.

fun.title: Fun
fun.content: Serious but fun! The courses are interactive and entertaining with attractive and modern visuals. Be prepared to actively participate.

fullMethod.title: A full method
fullMethod.content: A complete method with access to extensive resources: extra exercises, quizzes, vocabulary sheets, a quality blog and amazing French interactive stories.

WhoIAm.description: I‚Äôm a French teacher as a foreign language, expert on teaching online and creating high quality content for beginners and intermediate learners.

nativeCertified.title: A native & certified French teacher
nativeCertified.content: Born in the beautiful Burgundy region near Dijon, I have a Master‚Äôs degree in Education.

experience.title: 10+ years of experience
experience.content: I have taught in language schools, universities and business schools all around the world before going online with my students.

expertBeginners.title: An expert with beginners
expertBeginners.content: Where other teachers are often bored or not sure how to deal with total beginners, I love it and I have specifically crafted a method for them.

CommentsCarousel.title: What my students say <hs4>about my work</hs4>
CommentsCarousel.description: Here are some reviews of my classes. You will find many more

StoriesHome.title: Choose Your Path: Engage with our <hs1>Interactive French Stories</hs1> for effective learning.
StoriesHome.description: Diving into French can turn into a thrilling adventure with our interactive story app, crafted to whisk you away into the heart of the French language. By plunging into these tales, you'll level up your French in a fun and engaging way. So, why not <noWrap>give it a shot?</noWrap>
StoriesHome.bullet1: Pick your hero, armed with <noWrap>unique skills.</noWrap>
StoriesHome.bullet2: Guide him through a labyrinth <noWrap>of possibilities.</noWrap>

Newsletter.title: Subscribe to <noWrap>our newsletter</noWrap>
Newsletter.description: Stay informed and get a free video
Newsletter.successMessage: Thanks for joining our newsletter. Check your emails and start French now!

About.introDescription: I'm a teacher of French as a foreign language and a specialist in <noWrap>teaching beginners.</noWrap>
About.storyParagraph1: started as a primary school teacher before deciding to change my audience, quickly becoming an expert in teaching French as a foreign language. This allowed me the opportunity to work abroad as I went first to China, then to England and to New Zealand. In addition to working in many countries, I have also worked in a variety of different professional environments such as language schools (Alliance fran√ßaise), universities, and business schools where I was teaching general French to a demanding public <noWrap>of varied level.</noWrap>
About.storyParagraph2: Very early on, I specialized in teaching beginners as I always enjoyed seeing my students progress rapidly, being able to go from knowing no French to a level of confidence which allows them to survive in their environment and manage everyday situations. <noWrap>It's very rewarding.</noWrap>
About.storyParagraph3: In creating courses and materials online, I'm very happy to see that now my students come from different parts of the world. This drives me to always do my best to bring them answers and guide them toward <noWrap>their objectives.</noWrap>
About.storyParagraph4: I hope you will enjoy my courses and I look forward to hearing from you. Feel free to drop me a <noWrap>message anytime.</noWrap>

Contact.title: Contact us
Contact.description: Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions. We will be happy to answer you.

ContactClient.contactPrompt: Who would you like to contact?

ContactForm.successNewsletter: and you have joined our newsletter
ContactForm.successFooter: We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Hero.imageAlt: A man looking at a book from which magical effluences emerge
Hero.title: <hs4>Immerse</hs4> Yourself in French Through an Interactive <hs2>Story</hs2>
Hero.description: Discover the benefits of interactive stories to progress in French. Improve your language skills in a fun and engaging way.

StoryTabs.title: <hs1>Test Your French Skills</hs1> Through An Interactive Story
StoryTabs.description1: Dive into our interactive stories and explore <hs4>the countless possibilities</hs4> they offer. Feel free to start over and unlock as many achievements as possible - but you'll never get them all! üòà
StoryTabs.description2: These journeys require a solid foundation in French, but don't worry if you're not quite there yet. We've got you covered with <hs2>helpful translations</hs2>. With a bit of dedication and a dash of creativity, you'll be making magic in no time.

WhyStories.title: Why Should You Learn French with <hs2>Interactive Stories</hs2>?
WhyStories.description: Unleash the power of interactive stories for an engaging and effective French learning experience. Here are the key benefits.

languageComprehension.title: Language comprehension
languageComprehension.description: Interactive stories help to understand the structure of the French language and the context in which words are used in a natural, intuitive way.

vocabularyAcquisition.title: Vocabulary acquisition
vocabularyAcquisition.description: These stories offer an excellent opportunity to acquire vocabulary in context, making learning more effective.

adaptedToYourNeeds.title: Adapted to your needs
adaptedToYourNeeds.description: Whatever your skill level, interactive stories adapt to your specific needs, enabling you to progress at your own pace.

engagementAndEnjoyment.title: Engagement and enjoyment
engagementAndEnjoyment.description: Interactive stories make learning French more engaging and enjoyable, thanks to an immersive and captivating experience.

repetitionAndReinforcement.title: Repetition and reinforcement
repetitionAndReinforcement.description: Repetition, a key element of language learning, is also facilitated by these stories.

anywhereAnytime.title: Anywhere, Anytime
anywhereAnytime.description: Their online accessibility means you can learn anytime, anywhere.

BetaVersion.title: <hs4>Help Us</hs4> Craft Your Ideal Learning Experience
BetaVersion.subtitle: <hs2>Speak Up, We're Listening</hs2>. Got an idea? Noticed something we could do better? We're all ears. Every piece of feedback is a step towards creating a more effective and enjoyable learning experience.

tips.title: Tip
tips.description: Practical insights and strategies to fast-track your fluency in French, designed for maximum impact.

grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.description: In-depth guidance on the rules of French grammar to help you form accurate and complex sentences.

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Dive into essential French words and phrases to expand your vocabulary and improve your communication skills

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: Discover the rich tapestry of French culture, from time-honored traditions to historical milestones and artistic contributions.

expressions.title: Expression
expressions.description: Master idiomatic and everyday French phrases to sound more like a native and grasp the language's nuances.

orthography.title: Orthography
orthography.description: Tips and guidelines to perfect your French spelling, avoid common pitfalls, and write with confidence.

BlogList.description: In this section you will find articles and resources to help you <noWrap>learn French.</noWrap>

BlogLangButton.title: Choose Your Language
BlogLangButton.message: The content of the blog is available in English and French. You can change the language at any time at the top of the page.

VideoList.title: Our <hs1>Video</hs1> Resources
VideoList.description: Explore our collection of videos to learn French. Whatever your level, you are sure to find something to your liking!

PrimaryPage.title: The Complete French Course : Learn French - <hs2>Beginners</hs2>
PrimaryPage.description: French Language for Beginners (A0 > A2). French speaking, listening, grammar, reading, vocabulary with a native teacher.

YouLearn.title: What <hs2>you will learn</hs2>
YouLearn.learn1: Master the basics of French for good!
YouLearn.learn2: Build and develop the practical communication skills in French: Speaking, Listening, Reading, and Writing.
YouLearn.learn3: Express yourself with ease on familiar topics.
YouLearn.learn4: Start to speak real French confidently. (A2 level)
YouLearn.learn5: Be confident regarding your French skills, use and understand everyday expressions.
YouLearn.learn6: Learn grammar and vocabulary with fun explanations and exercises.

Description.para1: This first course is probably the most important since it will give you a solid base of the French language and will for sure motivate you to speak it fluently.
Description.listItem1: You want to be serious about learning French (but with some fun, interactive and visually interesting exercises).
Description.listItem2: You need something structured (following The Common European Framework of Reference for Languages).
Description.listItem3: You want extra material after the lesson.
Description.listItem4: You are interested in getting A1 or A2 for DELF / TCF / TEF / FIDE ...
Description.para2: The course is divided in 28 lessons (16 hours of videos) all following a very logical progression which is based on many years of teaching and dozens of French methods. I also use the exact same material with my private students in one to one lessons and I can assure you that they improve !
Description.para3: Each lesson has a specific objective or theme and comes with vocabulary and grammar. All this new knowledge is tested through many exercises. For that part (exercises) you will need a pen and a piece of paper to do the exercises with me. It's easy, just follow the instructions on the video !
Description.para4: After each lesson you will have access to the summary of the lesson, extra exercises (with corrections) and a vocabulary list. So please, do your homework :)
Description.content11: Talking About Your Tastes and Activities

IsForYou.title: Is This Course <hs2>Right for You</hs2>?
IsForYou.description: Make sure our course matches your needs and your current level of French. Feel free to contact us for any questions or for personalized advice before enrolling.
IsForYou.prerequisite1: You don't need any prior knowledge to start this course.
IsForYou.prerequisite2: The course is recommended to anyone who wants to learn French in a fast and efficient way.
IsForYou.prerequisite3: It's in French, don't worry: Immersion is the best method of learning a language.
IsForYou.prerequisite4: Native French speaking teacher with perfect accent.
IsForYou.levelDescription: At the end of this course you will have completed the A1.2 level and reach a low intermediate level of French (A2) allowing <noWrap>you to:</noWrap>
IsForYou.level1: understand sentences and frequently used expressions related to areas of most immediate relevance (e.g., basic personal and family information, shopping, local geography, employment).
IsForYou.level2: communicate in simple and routine tasks requiring a simple and direct exchange of information on familiar and routine matters.
IsForYou.level3: describe in simple terms aspects of your background, immediate environment, and matters in areas of immediate need.

LastComments.title: <hs2>Feedback</hs2> & Experiences
LastComments.description: Here's what our students say about this course. Form your own opinion on the quality of our teaching and the effectiveness of our method. You can find thousands of other reviews on

PrimaryPage.title: The Complete French Course : Learn French - <noWrap><hs4>Low Intermediate</hs4></noWrap>
PrimaryPage.description: French Language Course for Low Intermediate level A2 to B1. Advance your knowledge with a native teacher.

YouLearn.title: What <hs4>you will learn</hs4>
YouLearn.learn1: Deepen your knowledge of French and advance from A2 to B1
YouLearn.learn2: Learn all the tools you need for building longer and more complex sentences
YouLearn.learn3: Can deal with most situations while travelling in France
YouLearn.learn4: Learn the important French vocabulary and grammar for the level A2
YouLearn.learn5: Speak real French confidently on familiar topics
YouLearn.learn6: Start to express your opinion on different topics

Description.para1: First, If you are a complete beginner, please consider taking my first class :
Description.listItem1: You want to take your French to the next level.
Description.listItem2: If you finished my previous course and want to have a logical progression.
Description.listItem3: If you want to take the DELF A2 or a similar exam.
Description.listItem4: If you already learned some French in the past and would like to pursue the dream of speaking French üòâ
Description.para2: The course is divided in 18 lessons (~12 hours of videos) all following a very logical progression which is based on many years of teaching and dozens of French methods. I also use the exact same material with my private students in one to one lessons and I can assure you that they improve !
Description.para3: Each lesson has a specific objective or theme using real-life situations to learn new vocabulary and grammar. All this new knowledge is tested through many exercises. For that part, you will need a pen and a piece of paper to do the exercises with me. It's easy, just follow the instructions on the video !
Description.para4: After each lesson you will have access to the summary of the lesson, extra exercises (with corrections) and a vocabulary list. So please, do your homework üòä
Description.content7: Describing an Object and Its Function

IsForYou.title: Is This Course <hs4>Right for You</hs4>?
IsForYou.description: Make sure our course matches your needs and your current level of French. Feel free to contact us for any questions or for personalized advice before enrolling.
IsForYou.prerequisite1: You should have a good knowledge of the French A1 vocabulary and grammar.
IsForYou.prerequisite2: Ideally my first course : The Complete French Course : Learn French - Beginners.
IsForYou.levelDescription: At the end of this course you will have completed the A2.1 level. You will need to finish the second part of this course (which I'm already working on) in order to finish the A2.2 level and reach the beginning of B1.

LastComments.title: <hs4>Feedback</hs4> & Experiences
LastComments.description: Here's what our students say about this course. Form your own opinion on the quality of our teaching and the effectiveness of our method. You can find thousands of other reviews on

PrimaryPage.title: The Complete French Course - <noWrap><hs5>Daily Life Conversations</hs5></noWrap>
PrimaryPage.description: French Language Course - Intermediate level A2 to B1. Master Everyday French Communication with 100 Real-Life Dialogues.

YouLearn.title: What <hs5>you will learn</hs5>
YouLearn.learn1: Master everyday life situations in French
YouLearn.learn2: Acquire essential French phrases for various communication contexts
YouLearn.learn3: Consolidate your skills with targeted exercises and assessments
YouLearn.learn4: Immerse yourself in over a hundred practical French dialogues
YouLearn.learn5: Increase your confidence practicing with real scenarios
YouLearn.learn6: Understand and use the subjunctive and conditional moods

Description.para1: First, If you are a complete beginner, please consider taking my first class :
Description.listItem1: You finished my previous courses and want a logical progression
Description.listItem2: You wish a course based on real everyday life scenarios
Description.listItem3: You want to know all the practical and useful expressions and speak like a local
Description.listItem4: You want to boost your confidence and be able to handle various situations in France
Description.para2: The course is divided in 40 lessons (~23 hours of videos and a hundred dialogues) all following a logical progression and exploring all the real-life situations you could encounter in France.
Description.para3: Each lesson starts with engaging dialogues on a specific topic, paired with questions to check your understanding. Then we break down each dialogue, highlighting key vocabulary and new grammar. We put all that into practice and finally we finish with a focus on communication, giving you the essential sentences to be able to deal with your daily French situations easily!
Description.para4: For the exercise part, don‚Äôt forget that you will need a pen and a piece of paper to complete them with me. It's easy, just follow the instructions on the video!
Description.para5: And very important ! After each lesson you will have access to the summary of the lesson and a vocabulary list with all the good expressions to use for each communication situation along with the translation and an audio document to ensure a perfect pronunciation !
Description.para6: You will also find bilans or assessments with many exercises through the course. So please, do your homework üòâ
Description.content13: Describing Your Living Place - Settling In
Description.content38: Making a Positive or Negative Critique (Film - Show)
Description.content39: Making a Positive or Negative Critique (Exhibition - Art)

IsForYou.title: Is This Course <hs5>Right for You</hs5>?
IsForYou.description: Make sure our course matches your needs and your current level of French. Feel free to contact us for any questions or for personalized advice before enrolling.
IsForYou.prerequisite1: You should have an A2 level of French or strong A1.
IsForYou.prerequisite2: At least my first course : The Complete French Course : Learn French - Beginners
IsForYou.levelDescription: At the end of this course ranging from a A2 to B1 level, you will reach a conversational B1 level.

LastComments.title: <hs5>Feedback</hs5> & Experiences
LastComments.description: Here's what our students say about this course. Form your own opinion on the quality of our teaching and the effectiveness of our method. You can find thousands of other reviews on

PrimaryPage.title: Learn French - Intermediate <noWrap>level :</noWrap> Master <hs3>The Past Tenses</hs3>
PrimaryPage.description: Speak in the past in French - Learn the 3 main past tenses : Pass√© Compos√© - Imparfait - Plus-que-parfait.

YouLearn.title: What <hs3>you will learn</hs3>
YouLearn.learn2: Understand the differences between the past tenses and use them together
YouLearn.learn4: Master the 3 main tenses : Pass√© Compos√© - Imparfait - Plus-que-parfait
YouLearn.learn5: Practice with written and speaking exercises

Description.listItem1: You already have some knowledge of the French language (A1+/A2 level)
Description.listItem2: You would like something grammatically structured
Description.listItem3: You want to actively learn the Past Tenses (Do the exercises with me !)
Description.listItem4: You want to be able to express yourself in the past in French
Description.para2: The most important French past tenses are the Pass√© Compos√© and the Imparfait and they can be difficult to use for several reasons. They don't exactly have one english equivalent which make them tricky to translate. They also often work together and understanding the relationship between them is essential to communicating in French.
Description.para3: That's why, for each tense, we will see the different uses possible, the construction and finally we will practice with exercises.
Description.para4: Don't miss the summary and exercises sheets (with correction) that will help you practice and consolidate what you've just learned.
Description.para5: As a final assignment there is a project that you will be able to complete after attending this lesson. It is called "Une histoire d'amour - A love story" and you will find the Doc / PDF attached. I will gladly correct it and give you a personalized feedback. Use the summary of the lesson's PDF to help you with the verbs as well as the vocabulary list that is on the assignment sheet. Je suis impatient de lire vos histoires üòâ
Description.content1: Le pass√© - Pass√© Compos√© - Imparfait - Plus-Que-Parfait
